long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on Top of Your Salah Times with Ease

This extension is perfect for Muslims who want a hassle-free way to keep track of their daily prayers while browsing the web. With just a click, you can instantly view the upcoming Salah times and even set reminders to make sure you donâ€™t miss any.

Features:

- Quick Prayer Times: Get an instant overview of the next Salah, right from your browser.
- Custom Reminders: Set reminders for each prayer, so you get a nudge when it's time.
- Auto-Update: Prayer times update automatically based on your location, no need to worry about adjusting anything.
- Simple Setup: Easy to install and runs quietly in the background.

Whether you're working, studying, or just browsing, this tool helps you stay connected with your prayer schedule without any fuss. Give it a try, and let it help you stay punctual with your Salah!
